item.title: Evaluate Intensive Care Needs with ML
item.description: Machine learning (ML) can be used by hospitals to improve the quality of healthcare. The purpose of this post is to demonstrate the steps necessary to build ML models that evaluate the need for intensive care within the first 24 hours of hospital admission. This post includes the workflow process of data cleansing, feature engineering, and model building, which can be applied directly to real-world settings. Read more…
